ds_list_replace: This function will replace the value at the given position for another one.
The id of the list to change.
The position to replace the value, where 0 corresponds to the very beginning of the list and the final position is ds_list_size(id)-1.
The new value to replace the given value with.
The above code will replace the value stored at position 3 in the list for that stored in the variable "name".
